p: COVID-19 IgG rapid test (LIONEX Diagnostics and Therapeutics, Germany) was performed for the qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to SARS-CoV-2 in serum according to the manufacturer's instructions ( https://lionex.de/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/LD_COVID-19_IgG_EN_Instructions-for-use_Rev.-1.0-.pdf. Control samples included serum from patients with flu-like symptoms but negative for SARS CoV-2 RT-PCR.
